Subtitles.Subtitle: HI, GUYS! HEY, PHOEBE!
HEY, OH, HOW DID IT GO?
UM, NOT SO GOOD.
HE SAID, "WE SHOULD DO THIS AGAIN."
WHAT? "WE SHOULD DO IT AGAIN."
THAT'S GOOD, RIGHT?
NO, LOOSELY TRANSLATED "WE SHOULD DO THIS AGAIN" MEANS
Subtitles.Translation:
아니지, 다시 보자는 건
다른 말로 표현하면

Subtitles.Subtitle: "YOU WILL NEVER SEE ME NAKED."
Subtitles.Translation:
내 벗은 몸은
절대 못 본다는 뜻이야

Subtitles.Subtitle: SINCE WHEN?
SINCE ALWAYS. IT'S LIKE DATING LANGUAGE.
Subtitles.Translation:
원래 그래
남녀 사이에 통하는 말이지

Subtitles.Subtitle: YOU KNOW, LIKE, "IT'S NOT YOU" MEANS "IT IS YOU."
Subtitles.Translation:
당신 때문이 아니란 말은
당신 때문이란 뜻이야

Subtitles.Subtitle: OR "YOU'RE SUCH A NICE GUY" MEANS:
"I'LL BE DATING LEATHER-WEARING ALCOHOLICS
Subtitles.Translation:
가죽옷 입은 알코올 중독자
만나 보고

Subtitles.Subtitle: AND COMPLAINING ABOUT THEM TO YOU."
OR "I THINK WE SHOULD SEE OTHER PEOPLE"
MEANS "HA, HA, I ALREADY AM."
AND EVERYBODY KNOWS THIS.
OH, YEAH... CUSHIONS THE BLOW.
LIKE WHEN YOU'RE A KID AND YOUR DOG DIES
Subtitles.Translation:
우리가 어릴 때 부모님이
개가 죽었는데

Subtitles.Subtitle: AND THEY SAY IT WENT OFF TO SOME FARM.
THAT'S FUNNY. NO, BECAUSE OUR PARENTS ACTUALLY DID
Subtitles.Translation:
그거 재밌다
그런데 우리 부모님은 진짜

Subtitles.Subtitle: SEND OUR DOG UP TO LIVE ON A FARM.
UH... ROSS?
WHAT, HELLO? THE MILNERS' FARM IN CONNECTICUT?
Subtitles.Translation:
코네티컷에 있는
밀너 농장에 보냈다고 했잖아

Subtitles.Subtitle: THE MILNERS HAD THIS UNBELIEVABLE FARM.
Subtitles.Translation:
밀너 농장이라고
근사한 농장이 있다고 하셨어

Subtitles.Subtitle: THEY HAD HORSES AND RABBITS TO CHASE
Subtitles.Translation:
말도 있고 토끼도 있고
뛰어다닐 수도 있고

Subtitles.Subtitle: AND...
OH, MY GOD, CHI CHI!
Chandler: "SO HOW DOES IT FEEL KNOWING YOU'RE ABOUT TO DIE?"
"WARDEN, IN FIVE MINUTES MY PAIN WILL BE OVER
"BUT YOU'LL HAVE TO LIVE WITH THE KNOWLEDGE THAT YOU SENT AN HONEST MAN TO DIE."
Subtitles.Translation:
당신들은 죄 없는 사람을 죽인
죄책감에 평생 시달릴 거요

Subtitles.Subtitle: HEY, THAT WAS REALLY GOOD. YEAH? THANKS, LET'S KEEP GOING.
OKAY.
"SO, WHAT DO YOU WANT FROM ME, DIMONE... HUH?"
"I JUST WANT TO GO BACK TO MY CELL BECAUSE IN MY CELL I CAN SMOKE."
Subtitles.Translation:
나는 내 방으로 돌아가
담배를 피워야겠소

Subtitles.Subtitle: "SMOKE AWAY!"
I THINK THIS IS PROBABLY WHY DIMONE SMOKES IN HIS CELL, ALONE.
Subtitles.Translation:
이래서 디몬이 혼자
담배를 피우려고 하나 봐?

Subtitles.Subtitle: WHAT? RELAX YOUR HAND.
LET YOUR WRIST GO.
NOT SO MUCH.
ALL RIGHT, NOW, TRY TAKING A PUFF.
RIGHT.
OKAY, NO, GIVE IT TO ME. NO, NO, I'M NOT GIVING YOU A CIGARETTE.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 좋아, 이리 줘 봐
- 안 돼, 담배 안 줄 거야

Subtitles.Subtitle: DO YOU WANT TO GET THIS PART OR NOT? HERE.
Subtitles.Translation:
이 역을 하고 싶긴 한 거야?
어서 내놔

Subtitles.Subtitle: ALL RIGHT, NOW DON'T THINK OF IT AS A CIGARETTE.
THINK OF IT AS THE THING THAT HAS BEEN MISSING FROM YOUR HAND.
WHEN YOU'RE HOLDING IT, YOU FEEL RIGHT, YOU FEEL COMPLETE.
Subtitles.Translation:
이걸 쥐는 순간
마음이 편안해지면서 - 완전해지는 기분이지
- 담배가 그리웠어?

Subtitles.Subtitle: DO YOU MISS IT?
NO, NOT SO MUCH.
ALL RIGHT, NOW WE SMOKE.
OH, MY GOD!
THEY SAY IT'S THE SAME AS THE DISTANCE
Subtitles.Translation:
아니, 아니야 남자의 엄지 끝부터 검지 끝까지
길이랑 똑같다고 했어

Subtitles.Subtitle: FROM THE TIP OF A GUY'S THUMB TO THE TIP OF HIS INDEX FINGER.
Subtitles.Translation:
남자의 엄지 끝부터 검지 끝까지
길이랑 똑같다고 했어

Subtitles.Subtitle: THAT'S RIDICULOUS.
CAN I USE EITHER THUMB?
ALL RIGHT, DON'T TELL ME, DON'T TELL ME.
DECAF CAPPUCCINO FOR JOEY.
COFFEE BLACK.
LATTE.
AND AN ICED TEA.
I'M GETTING GOOD AT THIS.
Subtitles.Translation:
아이스티 - 실력이 점점 늘고 있어
- 그래, 아주 잘했어

Subtitles.Subtitle: EXCELLENT! VERY GOOD.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 실력이 점점 늘고 있어
- 그래, 아주 잘했어

Subtitles.Subtitle: GOOD FOR ME!
YOU OKAY, PHOEBE? YEAH, NO, I'M... IT'S NOT EVEN WORTH IT--
IT'S MY BANK.
WHAT DID THEY DO?
IT'S JUST... OKAY.
I'M GOING THROUGH MY MAIL AND I OPEN UP THEIR MONTHLY STATEMENT!
Subtitles.Translation:
계좌 월별 입출금 내역을
메일로 보는데 말이야

Subtitles.Subtitle: EASY!
AND THERE'S $500 EXTRA IN MY ACCOUNT.
Subtitles.Translation:
내 계좌에 5백 달러가
더 들어 있는 거야

Subtitles.Subtitle: OH, SATAN'S MINIONS AT WORK AGAIN.
NOW I HAVE TO GO THERE AND DEAL WITH THEM...
WHAT? KEEP IT! IT'S NOT MINE.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 무슨 소리야? 그냥 가져
- 내 돈이 아니잖아

Subtitles.Subtitle: I DIDN'T EARN IT. IT WOULD BE LIKE STEALING.
Subtitles.Translation:
내가 번 것도 아닌데
그냥 가지면 훔치는 거잖아

Subtitles.Subtitle: YEAH, BUT IF YOU SPENT IT, IT WOULD BE LIKE SHOPPING.
OKAY, OKAY, LET'S SAY I BOUGHT A REALLY GREAT PAIR OF SHOES.
Subtitles.Translation:
좋아 내가 그 돈으로
비싼 구두를 샀다고 치자

Subtitles.Subtitle: DO YOU KNOW WHAT I'D HEAR WITH EVERY STEP I TOOK?
Subtitles.Translation:
한 걸음 걸을 때마다
무슨 소리가 들리게? '내 게 아냐', 내 게 아냐'

Subtitles.Subtitle: "NOT MINE, NOT MINE, NOT MINE."
EVEN IF I WAS HAPPY, AND SKIPPING, I'D HEAR
"NOT, NOT MINE, NOT, NOT MINE..."
Subtitles.Translation:
그 소리가 들릴 거야
'내 게 아냐', '내 게 아냐'

Subtitles.Subtitle: WE'RE WITH YOU, WE GOT IT.
I'D NEVER ENJOY IT.
Subtitles.Translation:
알았어 절대 맘이 편치 않을 거야
평생의 큰 빚을 진 기분일 거라고

Subtitles.Subtitle: IT WOULD BE LIKE THIS GIANT KARMIC DEBT.
Subtitles.Translation:
절대 맘이 편치 않을 거야
평생의 큰 빚을 진 기분일 거라고

Subtitles.Subtitle: Monica: CHANDLER, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
WHAT IS THIS?
Subtitles.Translation:
- 세상에, 냄새!
- 이게 뭐야? - 뭐 하는 거야?
- 담배 피운다, 담배 피워

Subtitles.Subtitle: I'M SMOKING, I'M SMOKING.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 뭐 하는 거야?
- 담배 피운다, 담배 피워

Subtitles.Subtitle: YOU'VE BEEN SO GOOD FOR THREE YEARS.
AND THIS IS MY REWARD.
THINK ABOUT WHAT YOU WENT THROUGH THE LAST TIME YOU QUIT.
Subtitles.Translation:
잠깐, 담배 끊기가
얼마나 힘들었는지 생각해 봐

Subtitles.Subtitle: OKAY, SO THIS TIME I WON'T QUIT.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 이번엔 안 끊을 거야
- 말도 안 돼

Subtitles.Subtitle: PUT IT OUT! I'M PUTTING IT OUT.
OH, NO! I CAN'T DRINK THIS NOW.
I'M GOING TO GO CHANGE. I'VE GOT A DATE.
WITH ALAN AGAIN? HOW'S IT GOING?
Subtitles.Translation:
또 앨런 만나는 거야?
어떻게 돼 가?

Subtitles.Subtitle: IT'S GOING PRETTY GOOD, YOU KNOW. HE'S NICE, WE'RE HAVING FUN.
Subtitles.Translation:
잘돼 가고 있어
만나면 좋고 재미있어

Subtitles.Subtitle: WHEN DO WE MEET HIM?
LET'S SEE, TODAY IS MONDAY.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 언제 소개해 줄 거야?
- 그래 보자, 오늘이 월요일이니까...

Subtitles.Subtitle: NEVER.
NO, NOT AFTER WHAT HAPPENED WITH STEVE.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 절대 안 돼
- 소개해 줘 - 스티브 만났을 때 어땠지?
- 무슨 소리야?

Subtitles.Subtitle: WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
Subtitles.Translation:
- 스티브 만났을 때 어땠지?
- 무슨 소리야?

Subtitles.Subtitle: ( imitates lisp ): WE LOVED SCHTEVE. SCHTEVE WAS SCHEXY.
I DON'T EVEN KNOW HOW I FEEL ABOUT HIM.
Subtitles.Translation:
미안 지금은 내 감정을 잘 모르겠어
생각할 시간을 줘

Subtitles.Subtitle: LET ME FIGURE THAT OUT.
Subtitles.Translation:
지금은 내 감정을 잘 모르겠어
생각할 시간을 줘

Subtitles.Subtitle: THEN CAN WE MEET HIM?
MMM... NO... SCHORRY.
Monica: I MEAN, WHY SHOULD I LET THEM MEET HIM?
I BRING A GUY HOME
Subtitles.Translation:
집에 데려가면 5분도 안 돼서
완전히 뭉개 버리거든요

Subtitles.Subtitle: AND SOON THEY'RE ALL OVER HIM.
Subtitles.Translation:
집에 데려가면 5분도 안 돼서
완전히 뭉개 버리거든요 마치 제일 약한 녀석을
무리에서 없애려는 코요테 같아요

Subtitles.Subtitle: THEY'RE LIKE COYOTES PICKING OFF THE WEAK MEMBERS OF THE HERD.
Subtitles.Translation:
마치 제일 약한 녀석을
무리에서 없애려는 코요테 같아요

Subtitles.Subtitle: LISTEN, AS SOMEONE WHO'S SEEN MORE THAN HER SHARE OF BAD BEEF
Subtitles.Translation:
아주 상태 나쁜 놈들을
많이 만나 본 사람으로 얘기할게

Subtitles.Subtitle: THAT IS NOT SUCH A TERRIBLE THING.
Subtitles.Translation:
내 말 들어
그렇게 큰일도 아니야

Subtitles.Subtitle: YOUR FRIENDS ARE JUST LOOKING OUT AFTER YOU.
Subtitles.Translation:
네 친구들이잖아
다 널 위해 그러는 거야

Subtitles.Subtitle: JUST ONCE I WISH I'D BRING A GUY HOME THEY LIKED.
Subtitles.Translation:
알죠, 알아요 한 번이라도 내가 데려가는 남자를
친구들이 좋아하면 좋겠어요

Subtitles.Subtitle: WELL, YOU DO REALIZE THAT THE ODDS OF THAT HAPPENING
ARE A LITTLE SLIMMER IF THEY NEVER MEET THE GUY.
LET IT GO, ROSS.
YEAH, WELL, YOU DIDN'T KNOW CHI CHI.
Monica: DO YOU ALL PROMISE?
All: YEAH, WE PROMISE. WE'LL BE GOOD.
CHANDLER, DO YOU PROMISE?
YOU CAN COME IN BUT YOUR FILTER-TIPPED LITTLE BUDDY STAYS OUTSIDE.
Subtitles.Translation:
넌 들어와도 되지만
필터 달린 친구는 안 돼

Subtitles.Subtitle: Ross: HEY, PHOEBES!
"DEAR MS. BUFFAY: "THANK YOU FOR CALLING ATTENTION TO OUR ERROR.
Subtitles.Translation:
'버페이 양, 본사의 착오를
지적해 주셔서 감사합니다'

Subtitles.Subtitle: "WE HAVE CREDITED YOUR ACCOUNT $500. "WE'RE SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE
Subtitles.Translation:
'5백 달러를 입금해 드렸습니다
폐를 끼친 것에 사과드립니다'

Subtitles.Subtitle: "AND HOPE YOU'LL ACCEPT "THIS FOOTBALL PHONE...
AS OUR FREE GIFT." DO YOU BELIEVE THIS?
NOW I HAVE $1,000 AND A FOOTBALL PHONE.
WHAT BANK IS THIS?
OKAY, IT'S HIM.
WHO IS IT? Alan.
CHANDLER, HE'S HERE!
OKAY, PLEASE BE GOOD, PLEASE.
JUST REMEMBER HOW MUCH YOU LIKE ME.
HI, ALAN, THIS IS EVERYBODY. EVERYBODY, THIS IS ALAN.
Subtitles.Translation:
안녕, 앨런, 친구들이야
얘들아, 여긴 앨런

Subtitles.Subtitle: HI.
All: HI, ALAN.
I'VE HEARD SCHO MUSCH ABOUT ALL YOU GUYS.
I'LL CALL YOU TOMORROW. THANK YOU.
OKAY... OKAY, LET'S LET THE ALAN-BASHING BEGIN.
WHO'S GOING TO TAKE THE FIRST SHOT? HMM?
COME ON!
I'LL GO.
LET'S START WITH THE WAY HE KEPT PICKING AT...
YOU KNOW, I'M SORRY, I CAN'T DO THIS.
WE LOVED HIM.
All: WE LOVED HIM!
Subtitles.Translation:
- 맘에 쏙 들어
- 정말 괜찮더라 잠깐만

Subtitles.Subtitle: WE'RE TALKING ABOUT SOMEONE THAT I'M GOING OUT WITH?
All: YES!
AND DID YOU NOTICE?
Men: YEAH, IT'S GREAT.
YOU KNOW WHAT WAS GREAT? HOW HIS SMILE WAS CROOKED.
Subtitles.Translation:
뭐가 근사한지 알아?
웃는 모습이 약간 비뚤어진 거

Subtitles.Subtitle: YES, LIKE THE MAN IN THE SHOE.
WHAT SHOE?
FROM THE NURSERY RHYME:
"THERE WAS A CROOKED MAN WHO HAD A CROOKED SMILE
"WHO LIVED IN A SHOE FOR A... WHILE."
SO I THINK ALAN... WILL BECOME THE YARDSTICK
Subtitles.Translation: 이제부턴 앨런을 미래 남자 친구들의 기준으로 삼자

Subtitles.Subtitle: AGAINST WHICH ALL FUTURE BOYFRIENDS WILL BE MEASURED.
WHAT FUTURE BOYFRIENDS?
NO, I THINK THIS COULD BE...
REALLY?
Subtitles.Translation:
아니, 다른 사람은 안 돼 - 정말?
- 그래

Subtitles.Subtitle: I'D MARRY HIM FOR HIS DAVID HASSELHOFF IMPRESSION.
YOU KNOW I'M GOING TO BE DOING THAT AT PARTIES, RIGHT?
YOU KNOW WHAT I LIKE MOST ABOUT HIM? WHAT?
Subtitles.Translation:
- 뭐가 제일 맘에 드는지 알아?
- 뭔데?

Subtitles.Subtitle: THE WAY HE MAKES ME FEEL ABOUT MYSELF.
Subtitles.Translation:
내가 괜찮은 사람인 것 같은
기분이 들어

Subtitles.Subtitle: YEAH. YEAH. YEAH. YEAH.
HI.
HOW WAS THE GAME?
WELL...
All: WE WON!
FANTASTIC! I HAVE ONE QUESTION. HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE?
Subtitles.Translation:
잘됐다, 하나만 물을게
어떻게 이긴 거야?

Subtitles.Subtitle: ALAN. HE WAS UNBELIEVABLE.
HE WAS LIKE THAT BUGS BUNNY CARTOON WHERE BUGS IS PLAYING ALL THE POSITIONS
Subtitles.Translation:
'벅스 바니' 만화처럼
이곳저곳 맘대로 누비는 거야

Subtitles.Subtitle: BUT INSTEAD IT WAS FIRST BASE, ALAN; SECOND BASE, ALAN; THIRD BASE, ALAN.
I MEAN, IT WAS LIKE HE MADE US INTO A TEAM.
Subtitles.Translation:
그 사람이 우리를
한 팀으로 만들어 줬어

Subtitles.Subtitle: YEP, WE SURE SHOWED THOSE HASIDIC JEWELERS
A THING OR TWO ABOUT SOFTBALL.
CAN I ASK YOU GUYS A QUESTION?
DO YOU EVER THINK THAT ALAN IS MAYBE SOMETIMES...
I DON'T KNOW, A LITTLE TOO ALAN?
Rachel: OH, NO, THAT'S NOT POSSIBLE. ONE CAN NEVER BE TOO ALAN.
Subtitles.Translation:
천만에, 그런 소리 마
너무 앨런스럽다니

Subtitles.Subtitle: YEAH, IT'S HIS INNATE ALAN-NESS THAT WE ADORE.
I PERSONALLY COULD HAVE A GALLON OF ALAN.
Subtitles.Translation: 난 앨런이 한 갤런 있으면 좋겠다

Subtitles.Subtitle: HEY, LIZZY. HEY, WEIRD GIRL.
I BROUGHT YOU ALPHABET SOUP. WITHOUT THE VOWELS?
YES, BUT I LEFT IN THE "Y"s
Subtitles.Translation:
네, 근데 'Y'는 빼놓고 왔어요
모음, 자음 왔다 갔다 하잖아요

Subtitles.Subtitle: BECAUSE YOU KNOW, "SOMETIMES Y..."
Subtitles.Translation:
네, 근데 'Y'는 빼놓고 왔어요
모음, 자음 왔다 갔다 하잖아요 다른 것도 가져왔어요

Subtitles.Subtitle: I HAVE SOMETHING ELSE. SALTINES?
NO, BUT WOULD YOU LIKE $1,000 AND A FOOTBALL PHONE?
WHAT?
OH, MY GOD!
THERE'S REALLY MONEY IN HERE. I KNOW.
WEIRD GIRL, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
I WANT YOU TO HAVE IT.
NO, NO, I HAVE TO GIVE YOU SOMETHING.
NO, IT'S FINE, YOU DON'T...
DO YOU WANT MY TINFOIL HAT?
NO, BECAUSE YOU NEED THAT.
PLEASE, LET ME DO SOMETHING.
OKAY, ALL RIGHT, I'LL TELL YOU WHAT.
YOU BUY ME A SODA, AND THEN WE'RE EVEN, OKAY?
Subtitles.Translation:
음료수나 사 줄래요?
그럼 공평하잖아요, 됐죠?

Subtitles.Subtitle: OKAY. OKAY.
KEEP THE CHANGE.
THANKS, LIZZY. SURE YOU DON'T WANT A PRETZEL?
Subtitles.Translation:
- 고마워요, 리지
- 프레츨은 안 먹을 거야?

Subtitles.Subtitle: NO, I'M FINE, THANKS. SEE YOU.
A THUMB?
I KNOW, I KNOW, I OPENED IT UP
AND IT WAS FLOATING IN THERE LIKE THIS TINY HITCHHIKER.
MAYBE IT'S A CONTEST, LIKE, COLLECT ALL FIVE.
Subtitles.Translation:
다섯 손가락 전부 모으기
행사 같은 거 아닐까?

Subtitles.Subtitle: DOES ANYONE WANT TO SEE?
All: NO!
OH, HEY, DON'T DO THAT. PUT THAT OUT. COME ON!
IT'S WORSE THAN THE THUMB.
HEY, THIS IS SO UNFAIR.
WHY IS IT UNFAIR?
SO I HAVE A FLAW. BIG DEAL!
Subtitles.Translation: 그래, 나도 단점이 있다, 그게 뭐?

Subtitles.Subtitle: LIKE JOEY'S CONSTANT KNUCKLE CRACKING
Subtitles.Translation:
그래, 나도 단점이 있다, 그게 뭐? 조이는 항상
손가락 관절 꺾는 소리 내잖아

Subtitles.Subtitle: ISN'T ANNOYING?
Subtitles.Translation:
조이는 항상
손가락 관절 꺾는 소리 내잖아

Subtitles.Subtitle: AND ROSS WHO OVERPRONOUNCES EVERY WORD;
AND MONICA WITH THAT SNORT WHEN SHE LAUGHS.
I MEAN WHAT THE HELL IS THAT THING?
I ACCEPT ALL THOSE FLAWS. WHY CAN'T YOU ACCEPT ME FOR THIS?
Subtitles.Translation:
난 너희의 단점을 인정하는데
너희는 왜 날 못 받아 줘?

Subtitles.Subtitle: DOES THE KNUCKLE CRACKING BOTHER EVERYBODY?
Subtitles.Translation:
손가락 관절 꺾는 소리가
다들 그렇게 거슬려?

Subtitles.Subtitle: WELL, I COULD LIVE WITHOUT IT.
OH, WELL, IS IT, LIKE, A LITTLE ANNOYING
OR IS LIKE WHEN PHOEBE CHEWS HER HAIR?
Subtitles.Translation:
아니면 피비가 머리카락
씹을 때처럼 거슬리는 거야?

Subtitles.Subtitle: NOW, DON'T LISTEN TO HIM, PHOEBES. I THINK IT'S ENDEARING.
Subtitles.Translation:
쟤 말 듣지 마, 피비
내가 보기에는 괜찮아

Subtitles.Subtitle: OH, YOU DO, DO YOU?
YOU KNOW, THERE'S NOTHING WRONG WITH SPEAKING CORRECTLY.
Subtitles.Translation:
발음을 정확하게 하는 게
뭐가 문제야?

Subtitles.Subtitle: INDEED, THERE ISN'T.
I SHOULD REALLY GET BACK TO WORK.
OTHERWISE SOMEONE MIGHT GET WHAT THEY ORDERED.
Subtitles.Translation:
내가 주문한 게
또 엉뚱한 사람한테 가겠네

Subtitles.Subtitle: Joey: OOH, WELL!
OH, HO, HO, THE HAIR COMES OUT AND THE GLOVES COME OFF.
DID YOU EVER GO OUT WITH A GUY YOUR FRIENDS ALL REALLY LIKED?
Subtitles.Translation:
친구들이 좋아 죽는 남자랑
사귀어 본 적 있어요?

Subtitles.Subtitle: NO.
OKAY. WELL, I'M GOING OUT
WITH A GUY MY FRIENDS ALL REALLY LIKE.
Subtitles.Translation:
내가 사귀는 남자를
친구들이 굉장히 좋아해요

Subtitles.Subtitle: WERE WE TALKING ABOUT THE COYOTES HERE?
ALL RIGHT! A COW GOT THROUGH!
CAN YOU BELIEVE IT?
IT'S JUST... YOU KNOW WHAT?
I JUST DON'T FEEL THE THING.
I MEAN, THEY FEEL THE THING, I DON'T FEEL THE THING.
Subtitles.Translation:
걔들은 그게 있나 봐요
전 아무 느낌이 없거든요

Subtitles.Subtitle: HONEY, YOU SHOULD ALWAYS FEEL THE THING.
IF THAT'S HOW YOU FEEL ABOUT THE GUY, DUMP HIM.
Subtitles.Translation:
진짜 아무 느낌이 없으면
남자 친구를 차 버려야지

Subtitles.Subtitle: I KNOW, IT'S JUST GOING TO BE REALLY HARD.
HE'S A BIG BOY, HE'LL GET OVER IT.
NO, HE'LL BE FINE. IT'S THE OTHER FIVE I'M WORRIED ABOUT.
Subtitles.Translation:
아뇨, 남자 친구가 아니라
친구들이 걱정이에요

Subtitles.Subtitle: DON'T YOU RESPECT YOUR BODY?
DON'T YOU REALIZE WHAT YOU'RE DOING?
Subtitles.Translation:
네가 너 몸에
무슨 짓을 하는지 몰라?

Subtitles.Subtitle: I'VE HAD IT WITH YOU GUYS AND YOUR CANCER
Subtitles.Translation: 이미 많이 들었잖아 암에다가 폐병에 심장병까지

Subtitles.Subtitle: AND YOUR EMPHYSEMA AND YOUR HEART DISEASE.
Subtitles.Translation:
암에다가 폐병에 심장병까지 결국엔 너희도
담배 피우는 게 멋진 걸 아는 거지

Subtitles.Subtitle: SMOKING IS COOL AND YOU KNOW IT.
Subtitles.Translation:
결국엔 너희도
담배 피우는 게 멋진 걸 아는 거지

Subtitles.Subtitle: CHANDLER... IT'S ALAN, HE WANTS TO SPEAK WITH YOU.
Subtitles.Translation: 챈들러 앨런이 너 좀 바꿔 달래

Subtitles.Subtitle: REALLY, HE DOES?
HEY, BUDDY, WHAT'S UP?
OH, SHE TOLD YOU ABOUT THAT, HUH?
WELL, YEAH, I HAVE ONE NOW AND THEN. WELL, YEAH, NOW.
WELL, IT'S NOT THAT...
WELL, THAT'S TRUE.
GEE, YOU KNOW, NO ONE'S... NO ONE'S EVER PUT IT LIKE THAT BEFORE.
Subtitles.Translation:
아무도 그렇게
얘기해 준 적 없는데...

Subtitles.Subtitle: SO, WELL, OKAY, THANKS.
GOD, HE'S GOOD.
IF ONLY HE WERE A WOMAN.
YEAH.
And Lamb Chop and Hush Puppy...
HOW OLD IS THAT SOCK?
IF I HAD A SOCK ON MY HAND FOR 30 YEARS IT'D BE TALKING, TOO.
Subtitles.Translation:
30년이나 손에 끼워져 있으면
내 양말도 말하겠다

Subtitles.Subtitle: OKAY, I THINK IT'S TIME TO CHANGE SOMEBODY'S NICOTINE PATCH.
Subtitles.Translation:
니코틴 패치를 갈 시간이
다 된 모양이군

Subtitles.Subtitle: HEY!
WHERE'S JOEY?
JOEY ATE MY LAST STICK OF GUM SO I KILLED HIM.
Subtitles.Translation:
하나 남은 내 껌을 씹길래
내가 죽여 버렸어

Subtitles.Subtitle: DO YOU THINK THAT WAS WRONG?
HE'S ACROSS THE HALL. THANKS.
THERE YOU GO.
OOH, I'M ALIVE WITH PLEASURE NOW.
HEY, PHOEBES, YOU GOING TO HAVE THE REST OF THAT POP-TART? PHOEBES?
DOES ANYONE WANT THE REST OF THIS POP-TART?
HEY, I MIGHT.
SORRY.
YOU KNOW, THOSE STUPID SODA PEOPLE GAVE ME $7,000 FOR THE THUMB.
Subtitles.Translation:
음료수에 엄지손가락 들어갔다고
회사에서 7천 달러나 줬어

Subtitles.Subtitle: AND ON MY WAY OVER HERE
Subtitles.Translation:
- 세상에
- 7천 달러? 그리고 집에 오는 길에
껌을 밟았어

Subtitles.Subtitle: I STEPPED IN GUM.
Subtitles.Translation:
그리고 집에 오는 길에
껌을 밟았어

Subtitles.Subtitle: WHAT IS UP WITH THE UNIVERSE?
WHAT'S GOING ON?
NOTHING, I JUST THINK IT'S NICE WHEN WE'RE ALL HERE TOGETHER.
Subtitles.Translation:
별일은 아니고 다 모이는 게
좋을 것 같아서

Subtitles.Subtitle: NICER WHEN EVERYONE GETS TO WEAR THEIR UNDERWEAR.
Subtitles.Translation:
속옷 다 입고 모이면
더 좋을 뻔했다

Subtitles.Subtitle: UH, JOEY.
OH.
OH, OKAY.
( protestations )
PLEASE, GUYS WE HAVE TO TALK.
WAIT, WAIT. I'M GETTING A DEJA VU.
NO, I'M NOT.
ALL RIGHT, WE HAVE TO TALK. THERE IT IS!
Subtitles.Translation:
- 좋아, 얘기 좀 해
- 그것 봐

Subtitles.Subtitle: OKAY, IT'S ABOUT ALAN.
THAT YOU SHOULD KNOW.
I MEAN, THERE'S REALLY NO EASY WAY TO SAY THIS.
I'VE DECIDED TO BREAK UP WITH ALAN.
IS THERE SOMEBODY ELSE?
NO, NO, NO, NO, IT'S JUST...
YOU KNOW, THINGS CHANGE, PEOPLE CHANGE.
WE DIDN'T CHANGE.
SO THAT'S IT? IT'S OVER?
JUST LIKE THAT?
YOU KNOW, YOU LET YOUR GUARD DOWN
YOU KNOW, YOU START TO REALLY CARE ABOUT SOMEONE AND I JUST... I...
Subtitles.Translation:
네가 좋아하는 사람을
이제 겨우 나도...

Subtitles.Subtitle: LOOK, I CAN GO ON PRETENDING... OKAY.
NO. IT WOULDN'T BE FAIR TO ALAN, OR TO YOU.
Subtitles.Translation:
아니, 그건 나한테도 앨런한테도
너희한테도 공평하지 못해

Subtitles.Subtitle: YEAH, WELL, WHO WANTS FAIR?
I MEAN, I JUST WANT THINGS BACK YOU KNOW, THE WAY THEY WERE.
I'M SORRY. OH, SHE'S SORRY. I FEEL BETTER.
I JUST CAN'T BELIEVE THIS.
I MEAN, WITH THE HOLIDAYS COMING UP. I WANTED HIM TO MEET MY FAMILY.
I'LL MEET SOMEONE ELSE. THERE'LL BE OTHER ALANS.
Subtitles.Translation:
다른 사람을 만날 거야
제2의 앨런이 생길 거라고

Subtitles.Subtitle: OH, YEAH, RIGHT.
WILL YOU GUYS BE OKAY? HEY, HEY, WE'LL BE FINE.
WE'RE JUST GOING TO NEED A LITTLE TIME.
I UNDERSTAND.
I'M REALLY SORRY. YEAH. I'M SORRY, TOO.
BUT I GOT TO TELL YOU, I AM A LITTLE RELIEVED.
RELIEVED?
WELL, I MEAN, I HAD A GREAT TIME WITH YOU...
Subtitles.Translation:
- 안심해요?
- 네 사실 당신과는
좋은 시간을 보냈지만

Subtitles.Subtitle: I JUST CAN'T STAND YOUR FRIENDS.
REMEMBER WHEN WE WENT TO CENTRAL PARK AND RENTED BOATS?
Subtitles.Translation: 센트럴 파크에서 배 탄 거 기억나?

Subtitles.Subtitle: THAT WAS FUN.
YEAH. HE COULD ROW LIKE A VIKING.
( all mumble )
SO HOW DID IT GO?
UH... YOU KNOW. DID... DID HE MENTION US?
HE SAYS HE'S REALLY GOING TO MISS YOU GUYS.
YOU HAD A ROUGH DAY, HUH?
YOU HAVE NO IDEA.
Subtitles.Translation:
- 오빠는 상상도 못 할걸
- 이리 와

Subtitles.Subtitle: THAT'S IT, I'M GETTING CIGARETTES.
All: NO, NO, NO!
I DON'T CARE.
GAME'S OVER, I'M WEAK. I MUST HAVE THE SMOKE.
Subtitles.Translation:
끝났어, 난 약한 놈이야
담배 피워야 해, 피워야겠어

Subtitles.Subtitle: Phoebe: IF YOU NEVER SMOKE AGAIN I'LL GIVE YOU $7,000.
YEAH, ALL RIGHT.
